Enter your instructions for the AI. The field has two important placeholders that you must use: [PROMPT] and [TARGETLANGUAGE], which are described below. You can also use one or more [VARIABLE] placeholders. A different article describes AIPRM prompt variables.
PromptHint: One medical article. Up to 2000 words. SEO Optimized health blog post that will Rank on Google.
